price: آيا ته له دوی نه څه اجر غواړې؟ ستا لپاره ستا د رب دركړه ډېره ښه ده او هغه ډېر ښه روزي دركوونكى دى.
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ خَرۡجٗا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum kharjan fakharāju rabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru al-rāziqīna
